mapper.select: SELECT U_CODE, U_NAME, U_TEL, U_ADDR FROM tbl_users
SELECT U_CODE, U_NAME, U_TEL, U_ADDR FROM tbl_users WHERE U_CODE = #{u_code}
SELECT U_CODE, U_NAME, U_TEL, U_ADDR FROM tbl_users WHERE U_NAME LIKE '%' || #{u_name} || '%'
SELECT U_CODE, U_NAME, U_TEL, U_ADDR FROM tbl_users WHERE U_TEL = #{u_tel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_users( U_CODE, U_NAME, U_TEL, U_ADDR )VALUES( #{u_code}, #{u_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
